snippet: A middle school baseball player from Wilmington, N.C., was throwing batting practice Friday afternoon when he was hit in the head by a line drive.
abstract: Middle school baseball player from Wilmington, NC, throwing batting practice is hit in the head by a line drive; player, Alex Newsome, 12, dies a few hours later at a hospital.
lead_paragraph: A middle school baseball player from Wilmington, N.C., was throwing batting practice Friday afternoon when he was hit in the head by a line drive.

headline.main: 12-Year-Old Dies After Being Hit by Line Drive
headline.print_headline: 12-Year-Old Dies After Being Hit by Line Drive
